H0.text: Circular muscles are the muscles that control the anus.

H1.text: Elliptical is the shape of the muscles that control the anus.

H2.text: Irregular are the muscles that control the anus.

H3.text: Triangular is the shape of the muscles that control the anus.

A4.text: The internal anal sphincter is a ring of smooth muscle that surrounds about 2.5â€“4.0 cm of the anal canal.

A5.text: Its muscle fibres are arranged in a spiral (rather than a circular) manner.
